overview:
Andreas is the Chief Technology Officer of Yonja Media Group since 2005. Under his watch Yonja.com grew from a few thousand members to a site with over 5.7 million members and 1.5 billion monthly page-views.

Prior to joining Yonja Media Group, Andreas worked from 1995 through 2005 at American Management System (acquired in 2004 by CGI) as a Technical Architect. Andreas worked on consulting projects as well as product development for the telecom industry and new media business units. He worked on the design and development of a rating and billing system capable of processing the data volumes of the largest telecom operators in the US and Europe.

Andreas holds a Computer Science degree from HTL Brugg-Windisch, Switzerland and was awarded a patent in the area of customer data change tracking.
